us.codecraft.webmagic.scheduler

接口 Scheduler

  • 所有已知子接口:
    MonitorableScheduler
    所有已知实现类:
    DuplicateRemovedScheduler, PriorityScheduler, QueueScheduler

    public interface Scheduler
    Scheduler is the part of url management.
    You can implement interface Scheduler to do: manage urls to fetch remove duplicate urls
    从以下版本开始:
    0.1.0
    作者:
    code4crafter@gmail.com

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Request poll(Task task)
      get an url to crawl
      void push(Request request, Task task)
      add a url to fetch

    • 方法详细资料

      • push

        void push(Request request,
        Task task)
        add a url to fetch
        参数:
        request - request
        task - task

      • poll

        Request poll(Task task)
        get an url to crawl
        参数:
        task - the task of spider
        返回:
        the url to crawl
